NOTICE_DATA.n2016:PERFORMANCE_NUTS: ПОРАНЕШНА ЈУГОСЛОВЕНСКА РЕПУБЛИКА МАКЕДОНИЈА (PORANEŠNA JUGOSLOVENSKA REPUBLIKA MAKEDONIJA)

ML_TI_DOC.TI_CY: Dik li kienet ir-Repubblika Jugoslava tal-Maċedonja

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Public Entreprise for State Roads — Skopje

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Public Entreprise for State Roads — Skopje

CA_CE_CONCESSIONAIRE_PROFILE.ATTENTION: Repair Works on Bridge on the Vardar River on regional road R1103, section Lakavica - Negotino (Pepelishte)

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Repair Works on Bridge on the Vardar River on regional road R1103, section Lakavica — Negotino (Pepelishte)

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Repair Works on Bridge on the Vardar River on regional road R1103, section Lakavica — Negotino (Pepelishte).

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Tender guarantee in amount of 2% (without VAT).

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: Statement by the economic operator that it has not been announced, in the last 5 years, effective court decision for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering:
— certificate that it is not subject to bankruptcy procedure issued by competent Authority,
— certificate that it is not subject to liquidation procedure issued by competent Authority,
— certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public duties by the competent Authority in the country where that economic operator is established,

— certificate from the register of penalties for committed criminal acts of legal entities that a minor penalty ban on participation in procedures for public announcements, awarding of public procurement contracts and contracts for public private partnership has not been imposed,
— certificate from the Register of penalties for committed criminal acts of legal entities that a minor penalty temporary or permanent ban on performing certain activity has not been imposed,

— certificate that it has not been announced any sanctions for misdemeanor with an effective court decision, resulting in prohibition for pursuing professional activity or duty, i.e. in a temporary prohibition for performing professional activity,

— Tenderer (Bidder) is required to possess Certificate (License) A for construction of first (I) category structures, issued by the competent institution in the country as per the Construction Law in force (Official Gazette of Republic of Macedonia nº 130/09, 124/10, 18/11, 36/11, 54/11, 13/12, 144/12, 25/13, 79/13, 137/13, 163/13, 27/14, 28/14, 42/14, 115/14, 149/14, 187/14, 44/15, 129/15, 217/15, 226/15, 30/16, 31/16, 39/16, 71/16, 103/16, and 132/16), or for foreign economic operators, a Certificate issued by the Authority responsible for operations in the area of spatial planning / management according to Article 42 of the Construction Law (Official Gazette of Republic of Macedonia nº 130/09, 124/10, 18/11, 36/11, 54/11, 13/12, 144/12, 25/13, 79/13, 137/13, 163/13, 27/14, 28/14, 42/14, 115/14, 149/14, 187/14, 44/15, 129/15, 217/15, 226/15, 30/16, 31/16, 39/16, 71/16, 103/16, and 132/16) (applies to each member of the group in case the tender is submitted by a group of economic operators — JV).

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: Minimum annual income of 2 000 000,00 EUR/year in the last 3 years.
The economic operator shall prove that he meets the requirements for Economic and financial status by furnishing the following:

— copy of balance sheet report and data on income statements for 2015, 2016, and 2017, certified by a competent Authority, i.e. audited balance sheets or abstracts of the report on balance sheets, where balance sheet publication is required under the law of the country where the economic operator is registered,

— for foreign tenderers, in case balance sheet reports and data on income statements for 2015, 2016, and 2017 are not published, copies should be furnished of auditors’ reports of the Foreign Tenderer, which shall be positive and shall be issued by a reputable foreign institution registered to provide audit services. Auditor reports should contain data about the overall economic operation of the Foreign Tenderer (for the last 3 years).

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — minimum one (1) completed contract for construction, reconstruction, strengthening or repair of 1 or more bridges, overbridges, underbridges, overpasses, underpasses, viaducts, or interchanges in the last 5 (five) years of a value of minimum 60 000 000,00 denars,
— notification on contract items that the economic operator intends to subcontract to third parties, if any.
Personnel: the key personnel for construction works must meet the following minimum requirements (with specified structures):

(i) Project Manager — Chief Engineer (1 Bachelor of Civil Engineering — BS CE) possessing a Certificate A for construction in civil engineering, with at least 7 (seven) years of work experience in construction activities, 5 years of work experience in similar projects (construction, reconstruction, or repair of bridges, culverts, overbridges, underbridges, overpasses, underpasses, viaducts or interchanges);
(ii) Surveyor;
— possessing minimum a high school diploma of a geodetic technician — surveyor,
— minimum 5 years of work experience in civil engineering.

Equipment: the tenderer is required to either possess or secure an access (by renting, leasing, procurement contract, etc.) to the below specified key equipment that is fully operational, and is required to demonstrate that, based on the known commitments, it shall be available during the realization of the proposed contract.

For the equipment that is not in his ownership, the tenderer shall submit valid evidence as per the article 154 of the Public Procurement Law that this equipment and facilities are at his availability throughout the duration of the Contract.

The tenderer is required to either possess or have secured an access to the key equipment below (proof of ownership and completed tender form (9) Equipment and Machinery, which is an integral part of the tender documentation):
(i) concrete plant with total production capacity of minimum 20 m3/hour;
(ii) concrete mixer trucks for transport of concrete with minimum capacity of 5 m3 (5 pieces);
(iii) concrete pump with capacity of minimum 40 m3/hour (1 piece);
(iv) freight transport vehicles — trucks with minimum 10 tons loading capacity (5 pcs);
The economic operator shall prove that he meets the requirements of Technical and professional competence by submitting the following:

— copy of a Contract and a written confirmation of satisfactory works completion for one (1) completed contract for construction, reconstruction, strengthening or repair of 1 or more bridges, overbridges, underbridges, overpasses, underpasses, viaducts, or interchanges,
— notification about contract items that the economic operator intends to subcontract to third parties.
Personnel:

— for Project Manager: copies of the diploma and of the Certificate issued by competent national authorities, as per the Construction Law in force (Official Gazette of Republic of Macedonia nº 130/09, 124/10, 18/11, 36/11, 54/11, 13/12, 144/12, 25/13, 79/13, 137/13, 163/13, 27/14, 28/14, 42/14, 115/14, 149/14, 187/14, 44/15, 129/15, 217/15, 226/15, 30/16, 31/16, 39/16, 71/16, 103/16 and 132/16), copies of employment record or other respective proofs of work engagement as per the Public Procurement Law, and a completed Bidding Form — Candidate’s Short Biography, provided as an integral part of the tender documents,

— for Surveyor: copies of the diploma for completed secondary education — Surveyor, copies of employment record or other respective proofs of work engagement as per the Public Procurement Law, and a completed Bidding Form — Candidate’s Short Biography, provided as an integral part of the tender documents.
Equipment:

(i) for the concrete plant — proof of ownership or of secured access to one as per the Article 154 of the Public Procurement Law, and a written statement confirming that it is of the required capacity;

(ii) for the concrete mixer trucks for transport of concrete — proof of ownership or of secured access to ones as per the Article 154 of the Public Procurement Law, and a written statement confirming that they are of the required capacity;

(iii) for the concrete pump — proof of ownership or of secured access to one as per the Article 154 of the Public Procurement Law, and a written statement confirming that it is of the required capacity;

(iv) for the freight transport vehicles — trucks — proof of ownership or of secured access to ones as per the Article 154 of the Public Procurement Law, copies of registration certificates proving they are registered and in use, and a written statement confirming that they of the required loading capacity.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Public Enterprise for State Roads — Skopje, str. Dame Gruev nº 14, Skopje

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Authorized persons possessing power of attorney
